summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Community: Season 5
Review Date: 2015/06/23
Store: Joel McHale  (Actor),     Gillian Jacobs  (Actor)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles
Product Description: ['America’s smartest, edgiest comedy goes back to school with a vengeance! Just when you thought you’d seen and laughed at everything, along comes Season 5 to reinvent all the rules. “Bear Down” for the most jaw-dropping, polygraph-taking, hot lava-walking, ass-crack-bandit-pursuing, fantasy-roleplay-gaming, animated “G.I. Jeff”-hallucinating, hidden treasure-hunting, college campus-saving season that gets a rating of five MeowMeowBeenz! The fifth season of Community proves to be the most innovative and hilarious season yet – with Joel McHale, Gillian Jacobs, Danny Pudi, Yvette Nicole Brown, Alison Brie, Donald Glover, Jim Rash, Ken Jeong, Jonathan Banks and John Oliver.']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Comedy/Television', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Gillian Jacobs, Donald Glover, Yvette Nicole Brown, Joel McHale, Alison Brie, Jim Rash, Danny Pudi, Ken JeongGillian Jacobs, Donald Glover, Yvette Nicole Brown, Joel McHale, Alison Brie, Jim Rash, Danny Pudi, Ken Jeong  See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '2', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 4.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': '29085160', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Run time': '4 hours and 38 minutes', 'Release date': 'August 5, 2014', 'Actors': 'Joel McHale, Gillian Jacobs, Danny Pudi, Yvette Nicole Brown, Alison Brie', 'Subtitles': 'Thai', 'Studio': 'Sony Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: Great show. Every season they come up with a major competition. This time a D&D game. It's hillarious.
Review Title: Five Stars
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Monty Python's Life Of Brian [DVD]
Review Date: 2015/11/22
Store: Graham Chapman  (Actor, Writer),     John Cleese  (Actor, Writer)    Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Cult Movies, Comedy
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'The Gospel according to Monty Python: In Judea, a boy is born in a manger a short distance from and about the same time, as Jesus Christ. Three wise men from the East are for a time deceived by this proximity into believing that he is the promised Messiah, but it soon becomes apparent that he is, in fact, only a hapless peasant named Brian. However, the "Life of Brian" causes plenty of commotion for the Roman Empire and leaves him desperate to escape his burgeoning popularity.', 'Amazon.com', '"Blessed are the cheesemakers," a wise man once said. Or maybe not. But the point is', "Monty Python's Life of Brian", 'is a religious satire that does not target specific religions or religious leaders (like, say, Jesus of Nazareth). Instead, it pokes fun at the mindless and fanatical among their followers--it\'s an attack on religious zealotry and hypocrisy--things that that fellow from Nazareth didn\'t particularly care for either. Nevertheless, at the time of its release in 1979, those who hadn\'t seen it considered it to be quite "controversial."', 'Life of Brian', ', you see, is about a chap named Brian (Graham Chapman) born December 25 in a hovel not far from a soon-to-be-famous Bethlehem manger. Brian is mistaken for the messiah and, therefore, manipulated, abused, and exploited by various religious and political factions. And it\'s really, really funny. Particularly memorable bits include the brassy Shirley Bassey/James Bond-like title song; the bitter rivalry between the anti-Roman resistance groups, the Judean People\'s Front and the People\'s Front of Judea; Michael Palin\'s turn as a lisping, risible Pontius Pilate; Brian urging a throng of false-idol worshippers to think for themselves--to which they reply en masse "Yes, we must think for ourselves!"; the fact that everything Brian does, including losing his sandal in an attempt to flee these wackos, is interpreted as "a sign."', 'Life of Brian', "is not only one of Monty Python's funniest achievements, it's also the group's sharpest and smartest sustained satire. Blessed are the Pythons.", '--Jim Emerson']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Format': 'Color, Dolby, DVD, Widescreen, NTSC, Letterboxed', 'Contributor': 'Neil Innes, Graham Chapman, Terry Gilliam, Terence Bayler, Michael Palin, Eric Idle, Kenneth Colley, John Young, Terry Jones, Charles McKeown, Carol Cleveland, John CleeseNeil Innes, Graham Chapman, Terry Gilliam, Terence Bayler, Michael Palin, Eric Idle, Kenneth Colley, John Young, Terry Jones, Charles McKeown, Carol Cleveland, John Cleese  See more', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Mono)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 34 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'Yes', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.38 x 0.6 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Director': 'Terry Jones', 'Media Format': 'Color, Dolby, DVD, Widescreen, NTSC, Letterboxed', 'Run time': '1 hour and 34 minutes', 'Release date': 'January 27, 2004', 'Actors': 'Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Michael Palin, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle', 'Studio': 'Starz / Anchor Bay', 'Writers': 'Eric Idle, Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Michael Palin, Terry Gilliam', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: I just couldn't live with myself if I didn't get a copy.
Review Title: Fun Monty
Rating: 5.0

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind (Two-Disc Blu-ray/DVD Combo)
Review Date: 2022/02/28
Store: Alison Lohman  (Actor),     Patrick Stewart  (Actor),     Hayao Miyazaki  (Director, Writer)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Anime
Product Description: ['Product Description', "For the first time ever, the magic of Blu-ray(TM) high definition reveals the exquisite details in Hayao Miyazaki's epic masterpiece, NAUSICAÃ\x84 OF THE VALLEY OF THE WIND. Experience the film that launched the Academy Award(R)-winning career (2002: Best Animated Feature, SPIRITED AWAY) of one of the most celebrated filmmakers in the history of animation! After a global war, the seaside kingdom known as the Valley Of The Wind remains one of the last strongholds on Earth untouched by a poisonous jungle and the powerful insects that guard it. Led by the courageous Princess NausicaÃ¤, the people of the Valley engage in an epic struggle to restore the bond between humanity and Earth. Like Hayao Miyazaki's SPIRITED AWAY and PONYO, NAUSICAÃ\x84 OF THE VALLEY OF THE WIND will dazzle your senses with its intricately imagined storytelling and stunning animation -- now more spectacular than ever on Blu-ray!", 'Set Contains:', 'The clarity of the Blu-ray format heightens the power and beauty of Hayao Miyazaki\'s striking ecological fable. A notable extra is "Behind the Studio," a short documentary that features composer Joe Hisaishi, studio executive Toshio Suzuki, and director Miyazaki (as well as this writer) discussing the making and significance of', 'Nausicaä', '. "Enter the Lands" offers trailers of some of the Ghibli films and short descriptions of the main characters, but the map is rather tricky to navigate. Miyazaki\'s storyboards, timed to the soundtrack, were included in the previous release. Fans of Miyazaki\'s extraordinary films will want this Blu-ray for their libraries. (Rated PG: some scary imagery)', '--Charles Solomon']
Average Rating: 4.9
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Anime & Manga', 'Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Contributor': 'Edward James Olmos, Alison Lohman, Uma Thurman, Patrick Stewart, Hayao Miyazaki', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 57 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Director': 'Hayao Miyazaki', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Run time': '1 hour and 57 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 8, 2011', 'Actors': 'Alison Lohman, Patrick Stewart, Uma Thurman, Edward James Olmos', 'Dubbed': 'French, Japanese', 'Subtitles': 'English, French', 'Studio': 'Walt Disney Home Entertainment Presents A Studio Ghibli Film', 'Writers': 'Hayao Miyazaki', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: Completing my collection with this amazing Studio Ghibli movie. I love their dystopian, conflict themes. It's a classic that makes a great gift too.
Review Title: One of my favorites
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

['Product Description', 'The Gospel according to Monty Python: In Judea, a boy is born in a manger a short distance from and about the same time, as Jesus Christ. Three wise men from the East are for a time deceived by this proximity into believing that he is the promised Messiah, but it soon becomes apparent that he is, in fact, only a hapless peasant named Brian. Or maybe not. But the point is', "Monty Python's Life of Brian", 'is a religious satire that does not target specific religions or religious leaders (like, say, Jesus of Nazareth). Instead, it pokes fun at the mindless and fanatical among their followers--it\'s an attack on religious zealotry and hypocrisy--things that that fellow from Nazareth didn\'t particularly care for either. Nevertheless, at the time of its release in 1979, those who hadn\'t seen it considered it to be quite "controversial."', 'Life of Brian', ', you see, is about a chap named Brian (Graham Chapman) born December 25 in a hovel not far from a soon-to-be-famous Bethlehem manger. Brian is mistaken for the messiah and, therefore, manipulated, abused, and exploited by various religious and political factions. And it\'s really, really funny. Particularly memorable bits include the brassy Shirley Bassey/James Bond-like title song; the bitter rivalry between the anti-Roman resistance groups, the Judean People\'s Front and the People\'s Front of Judea; Michael Palin\'s turn as a lisping, risible Pontius Pilate; Brian urging a throng of false-idol worshippers to think for themselves--to which they reply en masse "Yes, we must think for ourselves!"; the fact that everything Brian does, including losing his sandal in an attempt to flee these wackos, is interpreted as "a sign."', 'Life of Brian', "is not only one of Monty Python's funniest achievements, it's also the group's sharpest and smartest sustained satire. Blessed are the Pythons.", '--Jim Emerson']

Product Description: ['Product Description', "For the first time ever, the magic of Blu-ray(TM) high definition reveals the exquisite details in Hayao Miyazaki's epic masterpiece, NAUSICAÃ\x84 OF THE VALLEY OF THE WIND. Experience the film that launched the Academy Award(R)-winning career (2002: Best Animated Feature, SPIRITED AWAY) of one of the most celebrated filmmakers in the history of animation! After a global war, the seaside kingdom known as the Valley Of The Wind remains one of the last strongholds on Earth untouched by a poisonous jungle and the powerful insects that guard it. Led by the courageous Princess NausicaÃ¤, the people of the Valley engage in an epic struggle to restore the bond between humanity and Earth. Like Hayao Miyazaki's SPIRITED AWAY and PONYO, NAUSICAÃ\x84 OF THE VALLEY OF THE WIND will dazzle your senses with its intricately imagined storytelling and stunning animation -- now more spectacular than ever on Blu-ray!", 'Set Contains:', 'The clarity of the Blu-ray format heightens the power and beauty of Hayao Miyazaki\'s striking ecological fable. A notable extra is "Behind the Studio," a short documentary that features composer Joe Hisaishi, studio executive Toshio Suzuki, and director Miyazaki (as well as this writer) discussing the making and significance of', 'Nausicaä', '. "Enter the Lands" offers trailers of some of the Ghibli films and short descriptions of the main characters, but the map is rather tricky to navigate. Miyazaki\'s storyboards, timed to the soundtrack, were included in the previous release. Fans of Miyazaki\'s extraordinary films will want this Blu-ray for their libraries. (Rated PG: some scary imagery)', '--Charles Solomon']
Average Rating: 4.9

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual shows a strong preference for comedic content, as evidenced by consistent high ratings for iconic comedies and cult classics. They favor shows and films that are innovative, fast-paced, and filled with clever pop culture references, demonstrating an affinity for humor that combines satire with a deep narrative. 

Purchase history reflects a recurring appreciation for well-crafted television series and films, with notable interests in ensemble casts and character development. Quality appears paramount, as indicated by consistently high ratings—averaging above 4.5—highlighting a pursuit of entertaining yet sophisticated viewing experiences.

Price sensitivity is less pronounced, as they seem willing to invest in quality products, notably special editions or formats like Blu-ray when added value is evident. Moreover, themes of life lessons, societal critique, and environmental consciousness emerge through selections from different genres—including anime—which underscores a preference for stories that provoke thought and reflection.

To summarize, the core preferences encapsulate a love for comedy with a penchant for quality, character-driven narratives, an openness to various genres, and a taste for titles that balance humor with deeper messages.

target_interaction.title: I love this movie
target_interaction.text: I was already a big fan of the trilogy and the books, this was a great movie, I love this edition and gifted to my friend during Christmas.
description: The Jurassic World theme park lets guests experience the thrill of witnessing actual dinosaurs, but something ferocious lurks behind the park's attractions – a genetically modified dinosaur with savage capabilities. When the massive creature escapes, chaos erupts across the island. Now it's up to Owen (Chris Pratt) and Claire (Bryce Dallas Howard) to save the park's tourists from an all-out prehistoric assault.Bonus Content:
